title: Rhiannon's Alien High Chancellors
description: Rhiannon Lyons is grieving for her missing best friend and sister of her heart since she disappeared four months previously. Rhiannon and Honey Potts had a long standing arrangement. They would go out on the town every Friday evening after work for some dancing and drinking.Since Honey's disappearance Rhiannon has taken to hitting the bottle at home and drinking herself into oblivion. One such Friday night she is visited by three bright warm lights and thinks she is hallucinating.Rhiannon wakes up with a raging hangover in the presence of three gorgeous blue aliens. She is convinced she has finally lost the plot and is imagining the three blue males. The three alien High Chancellors, Adarm, Thed and Gram, try to convince Rhiannon to join with them as she is their mate but she denies they even exist, until they have to join with her to circumvent the mating fever.Rhiannon is commitment shy and wants nothing to do with the three handsome aliens.Will they be able to convince her they are the best thing to happen to her? Or will she convince herself she has definitely and irrevocably gone insane?
author: Becky Wilde
